name: recodify
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to arrange something such as laws or rules again, into a new or different system: This law did little more than recodify changes enacted earlier in the decade. The committee has undertaken to re-codify the Highway Law.
More examplesFewer examplesIt is the task of the legislator to recodify as soon as possible the law on employment contracts.This is part of a citywide project to re-codify all of the city ordinances.The revised statutes recodified huge portions of New York State law.
